subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After managing only seven winning seasons in 21 years before Coach Charli Turner Thorne’s arrival, the Sun Devils are making their second trip to the N.C.A.A. tournament’s Round of 16 in three seasons.
snippet: After managing only seven winning seasons in 21 years before Coach Charli Turner Thorne’s arrival, the Sun Devils are making their second trip to the N.C.A.A. tournament’s Round of 16 in three seasons.
